Class oracle.html.Item

Class oracle.html.Item 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
public class Item
extends Object
implements IHtmlItem

Description:

The Item class is an abstract base class that provides the basic markup functionality for all HTML item classes

Instructions:

Since this is an abstract class, you cannot instantiate an object from this class directly. Instead, you should create your own class that extends Item class and then instantiate that new class.

Item(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, int)
Creates an item object
Item()
Creates an Item Object

endTag()
Return the end Tag for this item
print()
Print the content of object as HTML string to System.out
setBold()
set Bold/B attribute of item
setCenter()
set center attribute of item
setCite()
set Citation/CITE attribute of item
setCode()
set Code/CODE attribute of item
setEmphasis()
set Emphasis/EM attribute of item
setFontBig()
setFontColor(Color)
set font color attribute of item
setFontSize(int)
set font size attribute of item
setFontSmall()
setFontSubscript()
setFontSuperscript()
setHeading(int)
set Heading/H[1-6] attribute of item
setItal()
set Italic/I attribute of item
setKeyboard()
set Keyboard/KBD attribute of item
setSample()
set Sample/SAMP attribute of item
setStrongEmphasis()
set StrongEmphasis/STRONG attribute of item
setTeletype()
set TeleType/TT attribute of item
setVariable()
set Variable/VAR attribute of item
startTag()
Return the start Tag of this item
toHTML()
Returns content of object as HTML string
Implementation Note: Objct should be both browser-independent and browser-aware
